evidence.claim: The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations for managing healthcare data.
Veritas Association Management is involved in X12 transactions for healthcare.
Their services include integration with EHRs and clearinghouses, indicating interoperability capabilities.
The careers page highlights engineering roles focusing on healthcare integrations and cloud-based solutions.
